Package Coordinates

Class MyCoords

  • java.lang.Object
    • Coordinates.MyCoords
  • public final class MyCoords
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements coords_converter interface, it is used for basic calculations on points.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static Point3D add​(Point3D gps, Point3D local_vector_in_meter)
      Will convert to degree then add the points.
      static double[] azimuth_elevation_dist​(Point3D gps0, Point3D gps1)
      Calculates the yaw, elevation, distance of gps1 relative to gps0
      static double distance3d​(Point3D gps0, Point3D gps1)
      Calculates the distance between two gps (degree) points, uses vector3D to calculate the vector between them.
      static boolean isValid_GPS_Point​(Point3D p)
      Check if the gps point (in degree) is correct i.e: Latitude = [-180,+180], Longitude = [-90,+90], Latitude = [-450, +inf].

      Calculate the mid point between two points using the provided ratio

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public static Point3D add​(Point3D gps,
                          Point3D local_vector_in_meter)
        Will convert to degree then add the points.
        Parameters:
        gps - Point in degree as used in GameObjects.
        local_vector_in_meter - vector used for calculations.
        Returns:
        new gps point after transformation.

      • distance3d

        public static double distance3d​(Point3D gps0,
                                Point3D gps1)
        Calculates the distance between two gps (degree) points, uses vector3D to calculate the vector between them.
        Parameters:
        gps0 - point 1 in degree
        gps1 - point 2 in degree
        Returns:
        the distance in meters between the two points

      • vector3D

        public static Point3D vector3D​(Point3D gps0,
                               Point3D gps1)
        Calculates the vector between gps0 and gps1.
        Parameters:
        gps0 - point 1 in degree
        gps1 - point 2 in degree
        Returns:
        new point which represents the vector,

      • azimuth_elevation_dist

        public static double[] azimuth_elevation_dist​(Point3D gps0,
                                              Point3D gps1)
        Calculates the yaw, elevation, distance of gps1 relative to gps0
        Parameters:
        gps0 - point 1 in degree to be taken as anchor
        gps1 - point 2 in degree
        Returns:
        array of size 3 which holds the values.

      • isValid_GPS_Point

        public static boolean isValid_GPS_Point​(Point3D p)
        Check if the gps point (in degree) is correct i.e: Latitude = [-180,+180], Longitude = [-90,+90], Latitude = [-450, +inf].
        Parameters:
        p - point in degree to be checked
        Returns:
        true if valid, false otherwise.

      • midGPS

        public static Point3D midGPS​(double relative,
                             Point3D point1,
                             Point3D point2)
        Calculate the mid point between two points using the provided ratio
        Parameters:
        relative - ratio
        point1 - first gps point
        point2 - second gps point
        Returns:
        middle point
